amendment.description: Amendment increases the funding for the biofuels program by $20 million with offsets from the Common Computing Environment account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the bill, by transfer, by $20 million for the renewable energy program account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
